ygData.subject: RE: Re: Info Needed on items Spoilers are Accepted and  wanted
ygData.msgSnippet: impressive hehe.  lets just say i have never tried it with 6ppl and no enchanter, but have heard of those who tried and died hehe.  good job. Shada
ygData.messageBody:
impressive hehe. lets just say i have never tried it with 6ppl and no
enchanter, but have heard of those who tried and died hehe. good job.

Shada

>
> nah, we have taken the lord with a lvl 50 wiz, 50 war, 44
> war, 48 cleric,
> me (was 44 bard at the time), and 49 wiz. The two high lvl
> nukers pretty
> much ate the lord up quickly and then the two boks that where
> left where
> easy prey. well not easy but we did it :). However, if the
> guk knight would
> have spawned, we probably wouldnt have even attempted it. However, an
> enchanter of lvl 45+ just makes this a whole heckuva lot
> easier, and you
> really cant go wrong with two groups :)
